## Install packages

The following packages enable the code used in the workshop

```{r}
install.packages(c("ggmap", "leaflet", "readxl", "sf", "tidycensus", "tidyverse", "tigris", "tmap", "tmaptools", "viridis", "htmlwidgets"))
```


## Patch

The following package installations are helpful for the 023 lab computers which have an installation problem this fall.

```{r}
install.packages(c("curl", "skimr", "httpuv", "later", "promises", "mime", "png", "geosphere", "sp", "jpeg", "mapproj", "maps", "rjson", "rappdirs", "classInt", "e1071", "units", "maptools", "rgdal", "uuid", "XML", "raster", "rgeos", "mapview", "satellite"))
```
